terms.head.title: Privacy Policy and Terms - DevUtils
terms.head.description: Utility tools for developers. No tracking, no ads. Just utility.
terms.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Use
terms.intro: DevUtils is a collection of utility tools for developers, designed to be fast, lightweight, and privacy-friendly.
terms.noPersonalData: We do not collect personal data.
terms.noTracking: We do not use third-party services to track your browsing.
terms.noAds: We do not display ads and have no plans to include advertising.
terms.storageDesc: The only data saved locally is your preferred tools on the homepage, using localStorage. This happens only if you customize the modules you want to see by default.
terms.opensourceDesc: DevUtils is an open-source project. You can suggest improvements, report bugs, or even contribute new tools through our repository at
terms.finalNote: I believe in a free, collaborative, and transparent environment for developers.
footer.tagline: No ads, no tracking. Just utility | Privacy Policy & Terms of Use
footer.about: DevUtils is an open-source project made by developers for developers. If you'd like to contribute with new tools, improvements, or ideas, check out the repository on GitHub. Every contribution is welcome ‚Äî together we can build an even more useful and efficient suite.
